subject: [cc-devel] Creative Commons TechBlog
body:
Today we're soft launching the Creative Commons TechBlog.  The TechBlog 
is where CC/SC software people, interns, Summer of Code students, etc 
can blog about the technical side of things at Creative Commons.  We 
plan to blog about things which may be of interest to software 
developers or technologists, but which don't rise to the level of 
general interest to make them relevant to the main CC blog.

Check it out at http://techblog.creativecommons.org.

Nathan

-----
Nathan R. Yergler
Senior Software Engineer
Creative Commons
